name: Lilamon
description: Lilamon is a tall, beautiful  feminine Digimon with pink skin, black eyes, shoulder-length green hair, and white flower-shaped hands and feet, and six appendages on each hip, three in the front and the three in the back. It wears a yellow and green highleg leotard with a wing-shaped decoration on the shoulders, a rose on its chest, and a giant pink lilac on its back, and a pink lilac -shaped hat.
